• One 6-page sheet of Exclusive rules
• 96 color, die-cut 5/8” mounted game pieces
• 28 color, die-cut 5/8” markers
• 24 Event cards
• One 22” x 17” color game map
• Four color player aid sheets
• Polybag packaging and component storage
112995.name: Leipzig 20

112996.name: minishuffle und minicurling
112996.description:
In Table Shuffleboard, players push wooden pucks
down a long and smooth(!) wooden table into a scoring area at the opposite end of the table.

Shooting is performed with 'hammer' construction directly,
After both players (or teams) are finished shooting, then add up the score based on where the pucks finally landed on the Table Shuffleboard. It is not allowed that puck touches side band
scoring: puck scores depending (numbered) area it lands on
variants: quite a lot, like curling (similar to sport game)

112997.name: Baseball Mogul 2010
112997.description:
User Summary

A detaihed baseball simulation, ranging from general management to pitcg-by-pitch play, covering from 1900 to 2009.

112998.name: Shaman King: Legacy Of The Spirits – Soaring Hawk/Sprinting Wolf
videogameversion: North American Game Boy Advance edition
North American Game Boy Advance edition
112998.description:
Box Description:

Rise up against ghosts and spirits - the wicked shapes of history and culture!

-Shaman King - A new RPG for Game Boy Advance!

-Oven 1000 types of spirits! Gather as many as you can!

-Use the Spirit Merging technique to join two spirits and create together as a new entity!

-Trade spirits with your friends!

-Stunning graphics!

112999.name: Pac 'n Roll
112999.description:
Once when Pac-Man was still young, he spent a summer at the home of the great Pac-Master for training to fight the ghosts in Pac-land. During Pac-Man's training, Pac-Master's family went to the power pellet Harvest Festival with Pac-Man. The Ghosts (possibly young too) decided to summon the legendary ghost, Golvis. He was said to be so strong that he was sent to space by the ghosts themselves. Castle Pac were celebrating the large crop of power pellets gathered, when the Harvest Festival was suddenly disturbed by a UFO from which Golvis comes. In an attempt to save the Pacs, Pac-Master chomped on a power pellet. But while the other ghosts turned blue, Golvis remained his normal colour with only the end of his tail blue. Golvis and his alive guitar sidekick (possibly named Jack) turned the pac-people into spheres (they are the same just without arms or legs), and kidnapps them all. With the help of Pac-Land's guardian fairy, Crystal, Pac-Man managed to escape before getting kidnapped.
Now with the help of Crystal, Pac-Man (who has been put on Golvis' sphere curse) must save Pac-Master's family from the evil Golvis and Ghosts, with their evil plot to turn Pac-Land into Ghost-Land.

Source: Wikipedia, "Pac 'n Roll", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

113000.name: Shining Soul
videogameversion: North American Game Boy Advance edition
113000.description:
Box Description:

Beautifully created worlds await in this highly acclaimed action RPG. With multiplayer link up and many hours of gameplay, the incredible Shining Soul will stay with you forever...

112501.name: Iggy's Reckin' Balls
112501.description:
Box Description:

A vertical race up towering tracks

Iggy and the Reckin' Balls are in the race of their lives. A winner taks all dash to the top of twisted, looped, warped and generally demented courses!

-Smash, crash, and swing with Iggy, his friends, plus loads of secret characters!

-1-4 player racing action, Battle and Vs. Mode.

-Over 100 tracks, tons of shortcuts, secret paths, loops, and elevators.

Meet Iggy's Reckin' Crew!

-Iggy

-Stompii

-Dudkics

-Q-tex

-Narlie

-Amanda

-Charlie

-Chatter

-Sonny

-Rob-ert

112502.name: IHRA Drag Racing 2004
112502.description:
Box Description:

Race against some of the world's best-known drag racers in today's hottest cars on 1/4 and 1/8-mile tracks. Get right into racing with your favourite car, or customize it in the shop. Whether you're a newcomer or a lifelong fan, this is one drag racing game you can't live without.

-Experience realistic racing with fully detailed weather and atmospheric dynamics

-Choose from more than 35 vehicles, including classics and late models

-Features top cars and drivers from Top Fuel, Pro Mod, Pro Stock, and Funny Car

-Customize 70 vehicle components, from tires to transmissions to electronics

-Race a single event, a whole season, or go head-to-head against a friend!

112503.name: Go Diego Go! Animal Rescuer
112503.description:
Add, subtract, count and compare numbers as you zoom through a lush rainforest, rocky desert and icy Antarctica to help Diego rescue animals!
• Teaches identifying numbers from 1-100, skip counting by 2s, 5s and 10s, addition, subtraction and matching skills.
• Power through snowbanks as you learn about more than/less than.
• Dive into addition and help baby penguins learn to swim.
• Identify colors, shapes and patterns to help desert animals in distress.
• Parents can follow their child’s play and learning progress on the LeapFrog® Learning Path.
• Connect the handheld to your computer to access earned Coloring Page and Achievement Certificate rewards.
• Play in LeapWorld, a safe, online learning world with more games and rewards to expand the fun.
• Works only with Leapster and Leapster2 learning game systems.

Source: The Publisher Website.

112504.name: Dora the Explorer Wildlife Rescue
112504.description:
Explore animal facts and more on an amazing wildlife rescue adventure with Dora, Boots and Diego!
• Teaches letters, phonics skills, counting, animal facts and Spanish/English vocabulary.
• Listen to the sound each animal makes to match the baby to its parent.
• Choose the correct letter or number to help Dora and Boots cross the river.
• Complete the sequence to replace missing bridge pieces and rescue the animals on the other side!
• Parents can follow their child’s play and learning progress on the LeapFrog® Learning Path.
• Connect the handheld to your computer to access earned Achievement Certificate rewards.
• Play in LeapWorld, a safe, online learning world with more games and rewards to expand the fun.
• Works only with Leapster and Leapster2 learning game systems.

Source: The Publisher Website.

112505.name: Disney Pixar's Finding Nemo
112505.description:
Learn fun facts about undersea life as you swim along with Nemo, Dory and Marlin!
• Teaches numbers and math skills, phonics and reading skills and science facts.
• Learn about underwater plant and animal life as you search for Nemo.
• Choose the letters to let Dory settle safely in a stinging jellyfish forest.
• Select the correct number of fish to swim safely across the channel.
• Parents can follow their child’s play and learning progress on the LeapFrog® Learning Path.
• Connect the handheld to your computer to access earned Achievement Certificate rewards.
• Play in LeapWorld, a safe, online learning world with more games and rewards to expand the fun.
• Works only with Leapster and Leapster2 learning game systems.

Source: The Publisher Website.

112506.name: Leapster 2nd Grade
112506.description:
Meet the Algorithmics and engage in an extraordinary battle to stop a sinister villain from silencing the music of the world! This Leapster game teaches more than 50 essential skills for second grade.

Game works only with Leapster and Leapster2 learning game systems.

Source: The Publisher Website.

112507.name: Wolverine & the X-Men
112507.description:
Wolverine needs your knowledge of geometry to help him reunite the X-Men and stop the evil Mutant Response Division (MRD)!
• Teaches world geography & map skills, geometry, letter sounds, sequencing and patterns.
• Trace shapes to break into the MRD holding facility and rescue fellow mutants.
• Match letter sounds to objects with the same sound to find the X-Men.
• Use your map skills to locate X-Men and other mutants around the world.
• Parents can follow their child’s play and learning progress on the LeapFrog® Learning Path.
• Connect the handheld to your computer to access earned Coloring Page rewards.
• Play in LeapWorld, a safe, online learning world with more games and rewards to expand the fun.
• Works only with Leapster and Leapster2 learning game systems.

Source: The Publisher Website.

112508.name: Ni Hao, Kai-lan Beach Day
112508.description:
Put your memory and sorting and classifying skills to the test with snapshots, sand pails and more when you join Kai-lan, YeYe and friends for a super fun day in the sun!
• Teaches early number sense, phonics skills, logic and reasoning skills and memory skills.
• Collect objects on the beach and sort them by their characteristics.
• Help Kai-lan and Rintoo match items hidden under pails.
• Race your friend to the finish line using your math skills.
• Parents can follow their child’s play and learning progress on the LeapFrog® Learning Path.
• Connect the handheld to your computer to access earned Coloring Page rewards.
• Play in LeapWorld, a safe, online learning world with more games and rewards to expand the fun.
• Works only with Leapster and Leapster2 learning game systems.

Source: The Publisher Website.

112509.name: Disney Pixar's Up!
112509.description:
Identify animals and learn fun facts on a high-flying journey to Paradise Falls with Carl and Russell!
• Teaches addition and subtraction, more than/less than, logic and reasoning skills and animal identification.
• Identify animals and unlock clues to rescue Kevin from Muntz's blimp.
• Solve addition and subtraction problems to help Russell and Kevin dodge dangerous dogs.
• Use your skip counting skills to steer Carl's house past storm clouds and flocks of birds.
• Parents can follow their child’s play and learning progress on the LeapFrog® Learning Path.
• Connect the handheld to your computer to access earned Collectible and Coloring Page rewards.
• Play in LeapWorld, a safe, online learning world with more games and rewards to expand the fun.
• Works only with Leapster and Leapster2 learning game systems.

Source: The Publisher Website.

112510.name: The Incredible Machine 2
112510.description:
Box Description:

An act of creation which is equal parts art and invention

You've been at it for hours, you know the soccer ball and hot air balloon are in the right places--but that darned toast still won't pop up! Welcome to the addicting world of The Incredible Machine 2, the turbo-charged sequel to The Incredible Machine. Inspired by Rube Goldberg, it's a world where pinwheels and dynamite, fish and pulleys, even gravity and air density, can be manipulated to solve fiendishly fun puzzles. Go ahead, warm up your computer, limber up your brain--and prepare to be wowed, stumped and elated all at the same time.

-Work your way through 150 all new puzzles.

-Put your creative genius to work in Professor Tim's Workshop: create your own puzzles from over 100 animated parts.

-Go one-on-one with your buddies with our new brain-to-brain feature.

-Professor Tim is always available for a quick hint when things seem impossible.

-CD-ROM version features talking Professor Tim and fully orchestrated music.

-It's easy to get started and easy to use--so quit reading the package, take this home, and get started.

-Solve a puzzle by reading the goal: Make toast pop up. Next rummage through over 100 animated parts. Pull out the ones you want to build a solution. Several zillion combinations are possible, but you need one that works!

-Now crank up your machine and hang on! See if your construction strategy solves the puzzle. If so, your brain will dance with joy. If not, ask Professor Tim to step in and save the day.

-And when you really get cooking, challenge your buddy in two player mode. Race against the clock to see who can solve the puzzle first.

112511.name: The Italian Job (2001)
112511.description:
Box Description:

London, 1969. Charlie Croker has just finished a three year stretch, courtesy of Her Majesty's Prisons, and has an idea: to steal $4,000,000 in gold bullion, right from under the noses of the Mafia and the Turin Police.

This is where you come in... as one of his drivers, you'll have to master 14 vehicles, including flashy sports cars and the legendary Mini Cooper, as you screech down sewers, roar over rooftops and tear through the Alps, with the Mob and the law hot on your heels.

It'll be the crime of your life!

112512.name: Jeopardy! 25th Anniversary Edition
112512.description:
Box Description:

For the last quarter of a century, some of the smartest people in the world have been competing for crash prizes on Jeopardy!, the high-pressure answers and questions television game show.

Now it's your turn. Share the excitement with thousands of TV winners. Test your memory against even more challenging "Answers" In this all-new edition especially created to commemorate Jeopardy's Silver Anniversary. You'll be amazed at the things you know!

Plays Just Like the TV Version!

112513.name: Jeremy McGrath Supercross 98
112513.description:
Box Description:

It's Showtime!

-Endorsed by Jeremy McGrath, 7-time AMA Motocross Champion

-Jeremy McGrath designed tracks and bikes

Killer Features!

-Seven 3-D rendered indoor and outdoor tracks

-Realistic terrain like sand, mud, water, gravel and ice affect handling and speed

-Variable weather conditions like rain, snow and thunder

-Name your rider and customize your own 125cc and 250cc bikes

-Create and store 25 custom tracks on a single Memory Card

-Insane jumps, stunts, hairpin turns and painful wipeouts

-Multiple 3-D player perspectives

-Unlock hidden cheats and shortcuts

Smokin' race modes!

-Championship Series - players compete for first place and chance to race against Jeremy McGrath

-Time Trial - compete against "Ghost" rider image of your own best time

-Split-screen two player races

-Combines Supercross and Motorcross Racing

112514.name: Jeremy McGrath Supercross 2000
videogameversion: North American Game Boy Color edition
112514.description:
Box Description:

-The ONLY Supercross game with Jeremy "Showtime" McGrath!

-All-new engine featuring state-of-the-art graphics and bike physics.

-Design your own tracks with custom 3-D Track Editor.

-16 Supercross stadiums and licensed Motocross tracks.

-250cc and 125cc bikes plus Create-A-Rider.

-Sick Freestyle Motocross Competitions exclusively featuring Travis Pastrana!

-Race against 10-time Supercross Champ Jeremy McGrath and 7 other superstar riders: Pastrana, Button, Windham, Tortelli, Dowd, Ramsey, and Albertyn!

-Totally customizable bikes and racing modes, plus free-ride practice environments and variable weather conditions.

-Exclusive Jeremy McGrath advice and tips.

112515.name: John Elway's Quarterback
112515.description:
Box Description:

Line-of-scrimmage realism that puts you in the middle of the game!

112516.name: Justice League Heroes: The Flash
videogameversion: North American Game Boy Advance edition
112516.description:
From Wikipedia Plot Summary:

It covers what the Flash was doing while the other Justice League members were on missions. By the first level, Martian Manhunter warns Flash about a robot invasion in Keystone City, led by Gorilla Grodd.

During the second level, Superman and Batman are investigating a break-in at S.T.A.R. Labs and Gotham City is being attack both by regular criminals and robots. There, Flash confronts Killer Frost.

By the third level, the Martian asks Flash to help Themyscira, Wonder Woman's home island, where the sorceress Circe has taken over and turned all the guards into animals, and he's joined by the Green Arrow. Circe slips that Brainiac is behind the plot, but doesn't gives further details.

At this time, the Martian Manhunter is with Superman on Mars, fighting the white martians and Flash talks with Batman. The Dark Knight informs him about some floods across the Pacific, and Flash goes to investigate. Once there, he finds and confronts Zoom.

After this, Flash talks to Black Canary. Brainiac had invaded the Justice League Watchtower and was just driven away. She tells Flash that Superman will meet him up, and Flash challenges him to a race.

Once there, Superman is nowhere to be found, so Flash starts searching for him at Metropolis. Instead of Superman, Flash finds Brainiac, or at least one of his powered avatars. Brainiac mocks Flash, telling him about a bomb programmed to blow up and destroy Metropolis within two minutes, which leaves the player with two minutes to beat the final boss of the game. The rest of the story continues in the standard Justice League Heroes.

Source: Wikipedia, "Justice League Heroes: The Flash", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

112518.description:
From the publisher:

Description:
ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE

RenFaire Reanimation!

Expansion Deck

The Zombie Apocalypse is getting medieval on your ass. The undead are converging on the local Renaissance Festival and it’s not looking good. So grab a flagon of mead and a sword, you’re finally going to get the chance to really use that thing.

Welcome to the Zombie Apocalypse!

You need the Zombie Apocalypse basic deck to use this expansion.

Components:
RenFaire Reanimation! Deck (1 deck of 14 cards) Tuck Box, Clear, 52 Cards
112518.name: ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: RenFaire Reanimation

112519.description:
From the publisher:

Description:

Expansion Deck

You thought it would be safer in the woods.But the forest is a dark, ancient, place. Full of things long dead that would use zombies for their own ends. Now you don’t just have to worry about being eaten, but losing your very soul as well! That and mosquitoes, those things are a bitch.

You need the Zombie Apocalypse basic deck to use this expansion.

Components:
Within The Woods Deck (1 deck of 14 cards) Tuck Box, Clear, 52 Cards
112519.name: ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: Within The Woods

112520.description:
From the publisher:

Description:
Expansion Deck

The Zombie Apocalypse is too much for some people. Their mind goes long before a Zombie can get to it. You used to be able to go to a Doctor when you had problems like this, but what do you do when the Doctor has become the craziest one of all?

Welcome to the Zombie Apocalypse!

You need the Zombie Apocalypse basic deck to use this expansion.

Components:
Dead Medicine Deck (1 deck of 14 cards) Tuck Box, Clear, 52 Cards
112520.name: ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: Dead Medicine

112521.description:
From the publisher:

Description:
Expansion Deck

If you’re into Punk, this deck has it all. Punks, Punk Zombies, Punk Love. If you don’t care for Punk, that’s fine too. They’ll
probably all get eaten anyway. They say Punk is Dead, but it’s really only Undead.

Welcome to the Zombie Apocalypse!

You Need the Zombie Apocalypse basic deck to use this expansion.

Components:
ZA Expansions Deck (1 deck of 14 cards) Tuck Box, Clear, 52 Cards
112521.name: ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: Punk Ass Zombies!

112522.description:
From the publisher:

Description:

Expansion Deck

This deck is basically more of what you got with the original deck. It can be used as a side deck, but works best if just shuffled into the main deck to increase its size. This can give you a longer and more pleasing game, while also making multiplayer games more exciting. Just think of it as Extenze for the Zombie Apocalypse!

You need the Zombie Apocalypse basic deck to use this expansion.

Components:
Zombie Supplement Deck (1 deck of 14 cards) Tuck Box, Clear, 52 Cards
112522.name: ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: Zombie Supplement

112523.description:
From the publisher:
Description:
ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE

The Crawling Dead!

Expansion Deck

You’ve seen Running Zombies, Walking Zombies, Shambling Zombies, even Lurching Zombies. Now you’ve got Crawling Zombies. It took them a while to get here, but what did you expect, they were crawling. So you had better watch your ankles, or anything else you’ve got hanging low.

Welcome to the Zombie Apocalypse!

You need the Zombie Apocalypse basic deck to use this expansion.

Components:
The Crawling Dead Deck (1 deck of 14 cards) Tuck Box, Clear, 52 Cards
112523.name: ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: The Crawling Dead

112524.description:
From the publisher:
Description:

Expansion Deck

A new breed of Zombie has emerged in the Zombie Apocalypse. The Infected are not your typical undead Zombie, but a Human infected with a virus that makes them an unthinking killer that will attack anything else that moves, Human OR Zombie. They taste just the same to a regular Zombie though, just a little spicier!

Welcome to the Zombie Apocalypse!

You need the Zombie Apocalypse basic deck to use this expansion.

Components:
The Infected Deck (1 deck of 14 cards) Tuck Box, Clear, 52 Cards
112524.name: ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: The Infected

112525.description:
From the publisher:

Description:
Expansion Deck

The Zombie Apocalypse gets Metal with this theme deck. Metalheads beware! Some Zombies think you’re a treat. All that headbanging shakes your brain up like a nice, tasty, smoothie. MMmmm!! The Zombies have to take you down first, though. So all they may end up eating is a fistful of metal.

Welcome to the Zombie Apocalypse!

You need the Zombie Apocalypse basic deck to use this expansion.

Components:
Un-Death Metal Mayhem Deck (1 deck of 14 cards) Tuck Box, Clear, 52 Cards
112525.name: ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: Un-Death Metal Mayhem

112526.description:
From the publisher:

Description:
Expansion Deck

In the worst case of Wedding Crashing ever, the hordes of the undead have come to ruin some couple’s very special day. Unlucky for the Zombies, though, this couple’s armed to the teeth. What’s that saying again? Oh yeah,“Something old, something dead, something chewed on, something red.”

Welcome to the Zombie Apocalypse!

You need the Zombie Apocalypse basic deck to use this expansion.

Components:
Til Un-Death Do Us Part Deck (1 deck of 14 cards) Tuck Box, Clear, 52 Cards
112526.name: ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: Til Un-Death Do Us Part

112527.description:
From the publisher:

Description:
Expansion Deck

Some members of the Redneck nation have decided to venture into the ruined cities to search for supplies (beer). Did they make a wrong turn, or will it be the undead shambling for the hills? I think I just heard “Duelling Banjos” start playing.

Welcome to the Zombie Apocalypse!

You need the Zombie Apocalypse basic deck to use this expansion.

Components:
Better Red Than Undead Deck (1 deck of 14 cards) Tuck Box, Clear, 52 Cards
112527.name: ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: Better Red Than Undead

112528.description:
This new expansion can only be acquired by getting the Z-Day bundle with all 15 expansions!

It adds 14 new cards to the game.
112528.name: ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: Demon Zombie Hunters

112529.description:
This new expansion can only be acquired by getting the Z-Day bundle with all 15 expansions!

It adds 14 new cards to the game.
112529.name: ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: Mummified Madness

112530.description:
This new expansion can only be acquired by getting the Z-Day bundle with all 15 expansions!

It adds 14 new cards to the game.
112530.name: ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: Slashers, Killers, and Creepers

112531.description:
This new expansion can only be acquired by getting the Z-Day bundle with all 15 expansions!

It adds 14 new cards to the game.
112531.name: ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: Death-Con One

112532.description:
Three old men and a small child all sit around a small duck pond, tossing breadcrumbs into the water. With each ripple from a crumb, ducks race toward the new treat. (They never actually get the snack, due to the wily fish just below the surface, but it doesn't dissuade them from trying!) Passersby watch the scene for a moment, then smile, charmed by these four people idling away their time. Little do they realize that these crafty individuals actually have a standing wager: Each has chosen a color of duck in the pond as his own, and whoever can gather his ducks into a group first gets to choose the adventure for the day!

Feed the ducks is a board game for two to four players. Each game lasts about 20 minutes. Players drop breadcrumbs into the pond, in order to attract the ducks. There are ducks in 4 colors. The first player to coerce all the ducks of his color into a single group wins.

The basic set includes components for a 2-player game. In order to play 3- or 4-player games you need the additional ducks and counters (red and blue).

MATERIAL

This is what you need in order to play Feed the ducks:

- A board depicting a pond with 61 hexagonal spaces.

- 12 white ducks, 12 black ducks (plus 8 red ducks and 6 blue ducks optionally).

- A breadcrumb (not included)

- One white counter, one black counter (plus one red counter and one blue counter optionally).

- A carrying case.
112532.name: Feed the ducks

112533.description:
This new expansion can only be acquired by getting the Z-Day bundle with all 15 expansions!

It adds 14 new cards to the game.
112533.name: ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: Night of the Thinking Dead

112534.description: This new promo can only be acquired by getting the Z-Day bundle with all 15 expansions!
112534.name: ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: Epic Zombie Horde Promo Card

112535.name: Jedi Blackbird
112535.description:
From Introduction:

It is a time of troubles for the Jedi Knights. The peace and prosperity of the Republic have made the Order complacent. The Dark Side is everywhere.

NOW, word has arrived from the distant Outer Rim that the renegade padawan ORDO VALLUS has established a holdfast on the junk world of KONDU. The Jedi Council has hastily dispatched three Jedi aboard the starship BLACKBIRD. Their mission: to bring Vallus back to the Jedi Temple on Coruscant, where he will stand trial.

HOWEVER, when the Jedi ship drops out of hyperspace, it is confronted by the fleet of vile Hutt corsair Bokka the Bold. Bokka broadcasts on all frequencies -- the Jedi are not welcome here!

From Designer's Notes:

This game is specifically designed to be played as a one-shot and to run to completion in a typical 3-4 hour con slot. As such, it makes two changes to the Lady Blackbird rules.

First, pools are smaller–only 4 dice instead of 7. This is because the Jedi are powerful in their domain, and don't need as much help from the pool as Lady Blackbird characters do. Also, there are a lot of unanswered questions about these characters and I want the game to push towards refreshment scenes that will get those questions answered.

Secondly, to help that push towards refreshment scenes, I removed the option to take a pool die as a reward for a Key hit.

112536.name: Disposable Heroes: Point Blank
112536.description:
Point Blank is a brand new squad level skirmish system for 1:1 modern tactical firearm combat. Players are in charge of a squad or several fire teams and control the individual actions of their soldiers, weapon teams, vehicles or support weapons. The rules are focused on the tactical concepts of fire and maneuver, command and control, and morale as well as training and experience. Any period of modern firearms combat can be simulated, from The Great War all the way to today and beyond.

The Point Blank book contains everything you need to run games with infantry, artillery, and vehicles as well as rules for spotting and hiding, as well as night, weather, smoke, and fog. There are three major periods represented for the army lists in the book: WWII (which includes Germany, U.S., Soviet, British, French, and Polish. Vietnam (which includes U.S., ARVN, Australian, NVA, and VC. As well as modern forces for the Global War on Terror or any other modern hot spot (which includes U.S., British, Mujahideen, and Insurgent). Rounding out the book are three scenarios, each one concentrating on one of the periods covered in the book and focusing on a tactical concept. The missions include Combat Patrol, Ambush, and a VIP Snatch. There is lots more besides in this 94 page rulebook to keep players busy and gaming.

112537.name: Ollaan kimpassa
112537.description: Pairs draw cards which have body parts, for example fingers-fingers or thumb-forehead and the pair has to place card between those body parts. Pairs continue to add more cards, when first card falls the game is over for that pair.

112538.name: Hüttengaudi
112538.description:
Objective: "Après-Ski" implicates party ==>
20 different party games, splitted into

Games using dice: "Herr Pes", "Mäxchen", "Schweinejagd", "Spaß im Glas", "Eisbär", "Crash Down".

Games using cards: "Mogeln", "Kartenblasen", "Kartenklopfen", "Mau Wau", "Pech gehabt", "Nummer 7", "Paare finden".

Games for groups: "Kommando Pümperle", "Rippl Dippl", "Handgemenge", "Peter und Paul".

Communication games: "Obacht"(caution ==> pantomime and describing - mini 'Activity'), "Gefragt" (questioned ==> associate words) a und "Wörter finden" (building words - 'Pass the Bomb' without bomb), equipped with 55 question cards.
If someone 'fails' during a game he/she is collecting a 'Gaudipunkt' (= penalty), which immidiately leads to prior defined consequences (addult game)

more or less all of these small games had been already published by Piatnik years/decades ago - they are muddled along
into a mini edition

112539.name: Dawn Of Discovery: Harbor
112539.description:
User Summary

Earn money and tips by managing the docks in the harbor. Keeping the ships moving in and out of the harbor and keeping traders happy with low wait times will earn you more money in a given trading day.

112540.name: Das große Quiz zur Bibel
112540.description:
Objective: be the first to pass the finish line
- acting by turn -

using a die, picking up cards and finding the correct answer let your meeple move along
2 different editions: 1994 and 1997
content: 1000 questions out of Old and New Testament

112541.name: Wargasm
112541.description:
WARGASM (which stands for War Ground Air Special Missions) is a 3D real-time strategy game developed by Digital Image Design and published by Infogrames in 1998 for the Windows PC platform. The game uses the 3Dream engine which allows for rich, atmospheric and varied battlefields as well as cutting edge (for its time) graphics. The player acted as commander and could direct AI friendly units as to what to do via a simple control interface on a 2D overhead map, and if desired could jump directly into any allied unit and control it in the 3D real-time environment.

You can fight as a regular infantryman, special forces soldier, in a tank, in an armored personnel carrier (APC) or in a helicopter. Airstrikes are also available that are carried out by ground attack aircraft and stealth bombers but they cannot be controlled by the player.

Source: Wikipedia, "Wargasm", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

112542.name: Robo Defense
112542.description:
Robots are trying to get from one side of the map to another, and it's your job to stop them by building and upgrading some defense towers. There is always at least one entrance, and there is always an exit directly across from each entrance. The robots will always exit directly across from where they entered. Should a robot reach the exit, you can assume that it does something terrible, because it reduces your health by 1.

Source: The Publisher Website.

112543.name: The Daring Game for Girls
112543.description:
In this fun and informative adventure for Wii™ and Nintendo DS™ based on the bestselling, how-to book, The Daring Book for Girls, you are a spirited girl who is determined to set out on a grand adventure to either raft down the Amazon, climb Mt. McKinley, or go on an African Safari. Explore a schoolyard, neighborhood, and campground and learn fascinating facts while playing sports and games, tending a garden, crafting items in your workshop, selling goods and lemonade at your corner stand, and making new friends. Successfully complete the activities and challenges to acquire Essential Gear and earn enough Daring Girl Badges to achieve your goal and become a true Daring Girl!

- Based on the best-selling, how-to book, The Daring Book for Girls, which sold over 1m copies in the US. The franchise expanded this April with the second book, The Double-Daring Book for Girls
- A fun and informative adventure with 3 distinct environments and numerous mini-game challenges to earn gear, inventory and collectibles
- Choose between 2 modes: Move through the main adventure or cut straight to your favorite mini-games to try and set a new high score
- Pick from one of several character models with a wide range of ethnicities and features
- Play a variety of thrilling games and activities like freeze tag, double dutch, basketball, spy games, building a camp fire and cave exploring
- Test your entrepreneurial spirit by selling goods and lemonade at your own corner stand and use your profits to purchase new activities and expand on existing ones at neighborhood stores
- Learn educational facts about famous women in history and then excel in Pop Quizzes
- Make in-game friends by giving out friendship bracelets, friendship pins, flowers, or other crafted items
- Become a true Daring girl by earning all 6 types of Daring Girl Badges like Girl Lore, Life Skills and World Knowledge

Source: The Publisher Website.

112544.name: Dave Mirra BMX Challenge
112544.description:
Dave Mirra BMX Challenge brings you all the air and sick tricks you would expect from a game with Dave Mirra's name on it. You'll be challenged to racing and trick competitions to prove your skill on the ground as well as above it. Sophisticated bike and rider physics give the game realistic responsiveness, letting you feel every hill, snap every trick, and squeeze every bit of speed out of your rider. Lose your form, and you'll feel those same physics drive you into the ground mercilessly. Kiss the sky or the concrete . . . it's up to you.

Source: The Developer Website.

112545.name: Rage of the Dragons
112545.description:
From the back of the box:

In a town ruled by an evil religious cult, the battle to decide the strongest dragon begins! Each contestant is a champion who contends with the power of mighty dragons: Black Dradon, Red Dradon, Blue Dradon, and White Dradon. Go head to head in a tag-team partnership to test your attack and defense in the heat of battle.

112546.name: King of Clubs Mini Golf
112546.description:
In King of Clubs, you'll tee-off against the wackiest golfers this side of Augusta - including Bubba,
the Elvis impersonator. Take advantage of a magic bag full of tricky golf accessories - like
special balls and trick clubs.

Laugh through 96 competitive mini golf holes that will leave you in stitches.
Thank you.
Thank you very much.

Source: The Publisher Website.

112547.name: Defendin' De Penguin
112547.description:
From the creators of Purr Pals and Baby Pals comes Defendin' De Penguin - the first Real Time Strategy game on the Wii and DS primarily for children. Help our hero, Little Blue fend off hungry creatures that are eager to steal his town's fish supply. To thwart these hungry animals, you'll strategically place defense mechanisms throughout the town with each possessing unique strengths that are geared for specific animals. With the perfect combination of tower utilization, defensive placement, timing and strategy, Little Blue's food supply will be saved and you won't
go home hungry.

- First real time strategy geared for kids 12 and under
- Utilize an array of environmental ammunition to deter the enemy
- Use our hero Little blue to upgrade a tower or fish for money or retrieve special objects
- Use wits and strategy to defend your town from hungry invaders
- Upgrade towers to increase attack range and strength as enemies gain strength too

Source: The Publisher Website.

112548.name: George of the Jungle and the Search for the Secret
112548.description:
From the publisher's website:

Grab a vine and swing into a grand adventure with your friend, George of the Jungle! George is swinging and soaring through the dangerous terrain in search of the papers that hold the cure to a devastating disease - and he needs your help. A big, mean bird has snatched these precious papers and scattered them throughout the jungle. Join forces with George of the Jungle and help him find the missing pages. Without them, Doctor Scott and the Witch Doctor might never finish their research!

- Swing, run, jump, climb and charge your way through exciting adventures as George of the Jungle!
- Based on the classic Jay Ward series and the highly anticipated Cartoon Network release
- Enter the jungle - dangerous to some, a playground to George
- Interact with the whole gang - Ursula, Magnolia, Dr. Scott, the Witch Doctor, Shep and of course George's best buddy Ape
- Battle hostile monkey tribes, ferocious crocodiles, tiki warriors, and many other hilarious and entertaining enemy encounters
- Experience beautifully recreated cell shaded characters and rich, lush jungle environments

112549.name: Robo Army
videogameversion: North American Neo Geo CD edition
112549.description:
From the back of the box:

In a world full of chaos and destruction, a new dark power ruled the land. The cyber army called Hell Jeed have come within reach of their final objective... to create cyber cities; robot-infested cities where no human can be found. A hostile takeover... the people were no match... the masses were slaughtered... their human brains used to equip the new soldiers of Hell Jeed. The cyber army's invasion struck fear into the population of the major cities and the few lucky inhabitants fled for their lives. Unprotected and battle scarred, the world seemed doomed and mankind's end near...
But all hope was not lost. Maxima and Rocky have been called to return peace to the land. Will Hell Jeed dominate the world? Can Hell Jeed be stopped? In this 46-MEG 2-player action-smash, attempt to defeat the evil Hell Jeed by helping Maxima and Rocky, the two greatest war soldiers of the legendary ROBO ARMY!

112550.name: World Championship Poker: All In
112550.description:
Today's top poker games. The world's best poker players. Are you in?

Do you have what it takes to square off against the world's toughest players like Howard Lederer, Annie Duke, Robert Williamson III, Marcel Luske, Thomas Bihl and Erin Ness? You'll need superb skills, nerves of steel and a stone-cold poker face to win the pot in this latest version of World Championship Poker® featuring Howard Lederer All-In.

- Play 19 of today's favorite poker variations from Texas Hold'em and Five-Card Stud to Deuce-to-Seven Triple Draw and Razz
- Compete against the amazing likenesses, play styles and signature personality traits of six of the world's best professional poker players
- Become your own card champion with an enhanced Create-a-Character mode including more variations of skin tone, clothes, hats, and accessories
- Experience an enhanced look-and-feel, with more realistic characters and advanced animations something happening all the time!
- Discover six new themed poker environments to host the action with multi-table online tournament capabilities
- Challenge yourself like never before with smarter AI that actually thinks ahead

Both experienced players and casual gamers will enjoy hours of heart-pounding poker excitement.
Online play with World Championship Poker

- Compatible for online play with World Championship Poker All-In PSP® system users
- Eye-Toy™ USB Camera (for PlayStation®2) support

Source: The Publisher Website.

112551.name: Thrash Revised
112551.description:
Introduction
As the title implies, Thrash Revised is a revision of the original martial arts RPG created by Ewen ‘Blackbird’ Cluney. The original Thrash was born out of Blackbird’s need of an RPG that was as true-to-God to videogame martial arts as possible.
Thrash combines elements from White Wolf’s long dead Street Fighter RPG, Mekton-Z, and Ninjas & Superspies to simulate fighting games as closely as possible. Also, as most fighting games come from Japan, incorporating several anime elements, the game also contemplates those elements characteristic to the
genre and incorporate them into the game. The result was a system that’s incredibly flexible, easy to understand, and allows for the creation of nearly any character.

112552.name: Humaliens Battle
112552.description:
User Summary

Play as aliens or humans in an epic war. Fight on a number of battlefields, from land to sea to air. Upgrade your troops levels, increase the level of your base, unlock special power-ups and distribute them wisely. During battle you will have to choose which troops to generate, out of those you have unlocked.

112553.name: Thrash Revised 2
112553.description:
Introduction
The original Thrash is a Martial arts RPG created by Ewen ‘Blackbird’ Cluney, and combined elements from the Street Fighter RPG, Mekton-Z, and Ninjas & Superspies to be as true-to-God to videogame martial arts as possible.

Thrash Revised was a revision of the game which took advantage of how open the system was and able to generate any anime character, thus being tailored into a generic anime system.

Finally, Thrash Revised 2 is an evolution of that route, the system enrouted towards a slightly more organized structure. The idea started as a customization of Thrash Revised for my Phantasy Star game setting, but I liked the finished product so much I decided to adopt it as new standard. Also, some modifications were made from the original template used in the Phantasy Star setting to polish the system some more and make it a bit more homogeneous.

112554.name: Saint Seiya: Legacy of the Saints
112554.description:
Introduction
[T]his [is] my tribute to what was the first anime I knew as such. Just don't scare becuase of what I said, Saint Seiya isn't really bad(not that bad at least!), and the concept is propituous to a really good RPG. The main reason I'm writing this is because during my first year in
PnP RPGs saw a lot of tries of adapting SS characters with TSR rules, Palladium rules (Palladium rules aren't bad, specially with Ninjas&Superspies around) and so on...sadly, all that tries have been futile due to the lack of an RPG that captures the the true escence of anime and I have found Thrash just perfect for the job and here I am, presenting you this book (or what intends to be). This book was writen thinking on all that SS fans around, but principally to all of you who are not familiar with SS in order to introduce you into the SS universe. I could have just writen the new rules, maneuvers and so for playing SS characters on Thrash(after all, any SS fan already knows the story and stuff),but what of the people who just doesn't know SS? besides, what I'm trying to present here is a sourcebook in the most serious possible way, so I'm presenting in this book as much information on SS(and Greek mythology)as possible for me.Hope you all enjoy as much playing it as I(and every people that helped me) did writing it...enjoy!

112555.name: G_U_A_R_D_I_A_N
112555.description:
Introduction
Allow me to welcome you to the galaxy's finest training and improvement center for exceptional beings, welcome to the Gordon Universal Academy for Refinement and Development of unexploited potential of extraordinary Individuals And Neutralization of planetary threats. G.U.A.R.D.I.A.N, exists with the purpose of recruiting only the finest of what we call "extraordinary individuals": Individuals rare in the galaxy for their exceptional courage, valor, and might... people like you.

112556.name: Trine 2
112556.description:
Trine 2 is a sidescrolling game of action, puzzles and platforming.

You play as one of the Three Heroes who make their way through dangers untold in a fantastical fairytale world.

Physics-based puzzles with fire, water, gravity and magic; Wicked Goblins; Climb the tallest trees and towers in the enchanted forest!

Source: The Developer Website.

112557.description:
This game is built the biggest guild by the winner. The players take any shops and building, and the guild is more spread with special ranked people.

The order is decided by the auction as one time. The turn player take the building from one of kingdoms, and place in own player's area, or take any materials from own building, additionally
can take the help from one of kingdom.
Each player has the player's area in the front. The building cards are placed as like a pyramid to upper side.
Then the special ranked people also are placed as like a pyramid to downside.
Any cards are pointed.

However, sometimes the war is occurred.
Each player uses the worriers in the player's area. When lose, the player will lose a building. In the worst case, the special ranked people will leave.

The beautiful kingdom cards are drawn the icon in both sides. The helps change at each round. And in one game, some of the kingdom cards are used; players can play the different kingdoms at every time.
Many building cards are not only produced any materials, also changed any materials to other materials and products. The other building can keep more materials and worriers, and so on.
The materials are many cubes. They are used in order to build the great building and the special ranked people.

This is the card game, but the volume is same with the middle sides of board game.
112557.name: Guild

112558.name: Batman Returns (Genesis)
112558.description:
From the back of the box

Leap with Batman into wild acrobatic battle! The Penguin has Gotham City gripped in his twisted flippers. Track the Dark Knight's most feared enemies through intense search-and-destroy danger! Attack the deranged Red Triangle Circus Gang with the Caped Crusader's own weapons. Swing on grappling hooks across collapsing rooftops. Pitch deadly Batarangs. Rage down goon-infested streets in the Batmobile. Waylay mobs of street thugs by hurling smoke bombs, wrist-shields and swarms of bats from Batman's Utility Belt. Dodge Catwoman's slashing claws and swinging kick. Duel with the homicidal Juggler. Fight murderous Gargoyles and machinegun-toting clowns. Then slog through poisoned sewers to a heart-stopping face-off in The Penguin's lair!

112559.name: The Book of Visitations of Glory (Issue 1 - Spring 2001)
rpgissue: The Book of Visitations of Glory
rpgissuearticle: A map of a small portion of the Jakálla underworld
112559.description:
User Summary
The first installment of The Book of Visitations of Glory includes a map, scenarios, and fan-made material for the world of Tékumel.

112560.name: The Book of Visitations of Glory (Issue 2 - Winter 2001)
rpgissue: The Book of Visitations of Glory
rpgissuearticle: Comments and Kudos on Visitations of Glory #1
A Letter from a Friend in Tumíssa
The Illuminating Depictions of Various Citizens of the Tsolyani Empire
112560.description:
User Summary
The second issue of The Book of Visitations of Glory includes contributions from many of the original authors as well as a host of artistic representations of Tékumel people and creatures.

112561.name: The Book of Visitations of Glory (Issue 3 - Summer 2001)
rpgissue: The Book of Visitations of Glory
112561.description:
User Summary
The third issue of The Book of Visitations of Glory is full of fan descriptions of Tékumel architecture and historical annals, and scenarios for the world of Tékumel.

112562.name: The Book of Visitations of Glory (Issue 4 - Autumn 2001)
rpgissue: The Book of Visitations of Glory
112562.description:
User Summary
This issue includes a description of a significant religious holiday in the world of Tékumel, a Tékumel calendar, fan-fiction, and a scenario.

112563.name: The Book of Visitations of Glory (Issue 5 - Sep 2002)
rpgissue: The Book of Visitations of Glory
rpgissuearticle: Tékumel for ‘Over the Edge’, 2nd Edition Rules
The Court of the Purple Robes
112563.description:
User Summary
In the fifth installment of The Book of Visitations, a rules conversion, a fan-fiction experiment, and a web-based RPG are introduced.

112564.name: The Book of Visitations of Glory (Issue 6 - Jan 2003)
rpgissue: The Book of Visitations of Glory
rpgissuearticle: Local Usenánu Festivals During the Intercalary Days
Treatise of the Everflowing Water of Life
Usenánu: The Great and Powerful City of Two Rivers
112564.description:
User Summary
Issue six includes fan-fiction, language and map discussions, clan comparisons, and poetry.

112565.name: The Book of Visitations of Glory (Issue 7 - Apr 2004)
rpgissue: The Book of Visitations of Glory
112565.description:
User Summary
The seventh installment of this periodical includes a Tékumel scenario, articles, a novella, and Tékumel artwork.

112566.name: The Book of Visitations of Glory (Issue 8 - May 2005)
rpgissue: The Book of Visitations of Glory
rpgissuearticle: Updates from the Palace of the Priesthoods of the Gods
112566.description:
User Summary
This installment includes descriptions of the religious locations within Tékumel, fan-fiction, a scenario, and relevant artwork.

112567.name: The Book of Visitations of Glory (Issue 9 - Dec 2005)
rpgissue: The Book of Visitations of Glory
rpgissuearticle: The Brass-Bound Bones:  A Pi’úr Mígur hiZhalúkalel Adventure
112567.description:
User Summary
This issue includes two lengthy adventures for use in the world of Tékumel.

112568.name: The Book of Visitations of Glory (Issue 10 - Jul 2006)
rpgissue: The Book of Visitations of Glory
112568.description:
User Summary
The tenth issue of The Book of Visitations of Glory includes a description of a Tékumel ritualized magical procedure, a scenario, fan-fiction, and associated artwork.

112569.name: The Book of Visitations of Glory (Issue 11 - May 2007)
rpgissue: The Book of Visitations of Glory
112569.description:
User Summary
The eleventh installment of The Book of Visitations of Glory includes two long adventures for use in the world of Tékumel.

112570.name: KILEAK: The DNA Imperative
112570.description:
Box Description:

Deep beneath the South Pole permafrost, a crazed scientist has unearthed an ancient DNA code, dormant for over 2,000,000,000 years. Is it the discovery of the "ultimate evolution"? Or does he now hold the damnation of mankind in his grasp?

Only YOU can stop him.

-A REAL-TIME shooter where minutes are too long, hours not enough! In-future-tense!

-Amazing 1st person view. You ARE a one-man assault squad.

-An arsenal of weapons, ammunition and armor. Have you been doing your push-ups?

-Robot assassins with even more advanced A.I. than the military's most powerful computers.

-Secret rooms and strategy-oriented challenge where seconds count!

112571.name: The Book of Visitations of Glory (Issue 12 - Feb 2008)
rpgissue: The Book of Visitations of Glory
112571.description:
User Summary
This issue of The Book of Visitations of Glory includes scenarios and source material for role playing in the world of Tékumel.

112572.name: Kim Possible 2: Drakken's Demise
videogameversion: North American Game Boy Advance edition
112572.description:
Box Description:

Master gadgets, save the world!

Join the handspringing, wall-bouncing, judo throwing action in four crime-stopping adventures.

-16 heart-pounding levels in 4 action-packed episodes

-New enemy-battling moves in each mission

-5 cool gadgets: grappling hook, glue launcher, hot sauce, stealth suit, laser mirror

-Sharpen your moves in Shadow Training mode

112573.name: Kim Possible 3: Team Possible
videogameversion: North American Game Boy Advance edition
112573.description:
Box Description:

Kim and Ron team up to save the world together!

-Team up in multiplayer mode!

-Unlock mini-games, featuring Rufus!

-Master 6 new gadgets!

112574.name: Asalto al poder
112574.description:
“Asalto al poder” (Assault on power) is a strategy game that takes place in the world of business and influence peddling. The player will have the opportunity to get rich doing business both legal and illegal (scams), obtaining grants, creating enemies, going to trials ...

The game begins with an election to determine who initially hold the different powers (central, regional and local). With these premises, each player must manage the money they have to achieve the objective that will be assigned at the beginning of the game.

112575.name: Slumbering Tsar: The Hidden Citadel, Part 3: The Throne of the Demon Prince
112575.description:
From the publisher's website:

Ever upward the heroes climb through the great Throne of Orcus discovering the Artisans’ Quarters, providing clues to the true fate of the citadel’s inhabitants, the malefic Serpent’s Coil, the Creeper of the Halls, and the heritor’s of the Hidden Citadel’s guardianship from long ago.

112576.name: Konami Classics Vol. 1
112576.description:
Box Description:

The best retro games are back!

Castlevania: Symphony Of The Night:

-2D action at it's best

Super Contra:

-Play co-op with a friend

Frogger:

-A true arcade classic

112577.name: Galactic Civilizations: Altarian Prophecy
112577.description:
Rear of Case

2 New Civilizations to play as well as all your old favourites
New Huge Campaigns
Heaps of new game content that adds more depth to your gaming experience
Virtual endless re playability

112578.name: Hungry Monsters
112578.description:
From the publisher:
New children game from Tactic, where each player takes a roll of a small monster, who is looking to grow and get scarier.
Each player has a small board in front of them where they have 5x3 table of circles which needs to be filled with food.
Game has 12 different foods (drinks, hamburgers etc) Each row must have 5 different foods, but at least 1 drink.
When you are able to complete a row, you will receive a small special ability which helps you to get bigger faster and easier.
Monsters go around the board and collect food with different tasks (dice oriented tasks) and watch put from each other.
There are 4 monsters together and each one has their own abilities.
The first one to fill the board is the winner.

112579.name: Comicworld Ukraine
112579.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Comicworld Ukraine is a short and quick introduction on how to use the republic of Ukraine in superhero games. This short guide contains:

introduction to culture and history of Ukraine
condensed history of the country and tips on how to use it in your games
a selection of interesting places for your adventures
5 new characters, from the fighting Peremoha to the nefarious Rat Queen
short introduction to Slavic mythology

112580.name: Roope-setä Pörssipeli
112580.description:
From the publisher:
Robert's a great businessman, familiar characters take part in a duck Scrooge, organized by the thrill of competition, a businessman, to win a job Scrooge's group - the winner is the one who deserves the first million.
This game is monopoly/go for broke/payday/cashflow like game! The game goes around the board where players need to make decisions and some weird things, like to make a sound of money or what is the most expensive thing you know. Everytime when you get it right or other player think that you got it, then yu get the amount of money written on the card or on the spcae you are standing on!
Win, by getting a million!

In travel edition instead of the game board you have a small notebook for writing up the scores. Cards have modified accordingly. Travel version can be played up to 4 players.

112581.name: Lider (Número 25 - Septiembre 1991)
112581.description:
Sumario:


El Estado de la Afición
Clubs
Novedades
Comunikado
Actividades
Desafíos y Mercadillo
Cómic
Steve Jackson en barcelona
Ranking

La biblioteca de Ankh-Morpork
El consultorio del Orco Francis
Guía para Lobeznos (blancos)

Silencio, se juega
Desde Rusia con hexágonos

Plomo en las mesas
La Batalla de Rolica

Dossier Fútbol Americano
Blood Bowl

La voz de su máster
Psicología en La Llamada de Cthulhu (I)
Reglas de Asedio en Aquelarre

Módulos
La Llamada de Cthulhu

112582.name: Lotte lauamäng
112582.description:
Somewhere in Europe, near a big sea, there is a small village called Leiuatajateküla (Inventors Village), where it is thought as honor to be able to build and invent your own stuff. Every year they have a competition for inventions.
Who is the best inventor in the city? Maybe someone who can build a plane from paper and a string or a tractor from a old trumpet. Join in to take part in the best ever competition that ever was. This is a fast and tricky board game for 2 to 5 little inventors and fans of Lotte (Estonian animation), in where you have a lot of fun and no one will get hurt. Game fits for smaller and larger players, for academic and for school kids. Who wouldn't want to adventure with rabbit Adalbert and cat Bruno?
Be the first to finish your invention and score most with it to win the game.

112583.name: Lider (Número 33 - Febrero 1993)
112583.description:
Sumario:


El Estado de la Afición
Clubs
Novedades
Comunikado
Actividades
Desafíos y Mercadillo
Cómic
Oh Ruoooolo mío!
Ranking

El consultorio del Orco Francis
Sólo si el gión lo exige
Guía para Lobeznos blancos

Tablero de Cristal
Civilization

Dossier
La válvula de escape a tus instintos creativos
Publicar un juego de Rol
Greg Stafford; entrevisat al creador de Glorantha
Como convertirse en un disenyador de juegos
Mili KK, el juego de rol
Supervivencia

La voz de su máster
Concurso Runequest

Módulos
Star Wars
Aquelarre

112584.name: Blood of Fiends
112584.description:
Publisher blurb:

They have been shunned and feared by society forever. Born of tainted bloodlines and raised in shameful secrecy, the tieflings of Golarion count among their ancestors some of the greatest evils of the Great Beyond. Yet not all tieflings succumb to the sinister compulsions of their evil blood—some strive to rise above the stereotype and become heroes in their own right. This book explores all that it is to be a tiefling, including not only an extensive discussion of tiefling culture and society, but also presenting numerous variations on the standard tiefling character. Rules for tieflings of specific fiendish heritages, new feats and magic, variant tiefling abilities and tiefling appearances, and new options for inquisitors and summoners and sorcerers and clerics and more await discovery in this Pathfinder Player Companion!

112585.name: Xotic
112585.description:
Xotic is an arcade-style first-person shooter where you rack up huge scores by shooting enemies, creating chain reactions, and discovering secret power-ups and point multipliers. Armed with a weaponized symbiotic creature called the Macroterra, you must cleanse the evil presence and re-plant the seeds of life on a planet ravaged by the Orb.

Destroy the insidious Scab plants and new life will grow in their place, diminishing the Orb’s control of the planet. Detonate Scab plant chain reactions to earn score multipliers and chain bonus points! Collect Orb essence to boost your score, or grab them in mid-air to earn an aerial combo bonus! Collect all of the Orb essence in each level for an extra bonus.

Seek out and destroy the hidden Orb brains. Discover all the secret locations in each level to earn huge bonus points! Earn experience points to upgrade your weapons and skills, including Absorbtion which pulls points towards you automatically! Unlock the secrets of Hard Hologram technology to deploy mobile shields or aerial landing platforms.

Source: The Game Website.

112586.name: Stealth Bastard
112586.description:
Stealth games are awesome. Hiding from The Man, skulking in shadows, the thrill of the unseen infiltration. But why do they have to be so... slow?

Introducing Stealth Bastard: stealth, with a great big kick up the arse. A fast-paced, frenetic, one-step-away-from-chunky-death melange of sneaking, platforming, hacking and cursing. A whole lot of fun. It's like Metal Gear Solid and Super Meat Boy had a baby out of wedlock. Semi-literally.

Jump, sneak, and be horribly dismembered through 28 levels hand-crafted by our crack team of in-house design geniuses, some of the same folk behind the critically-acclaimed Fluidity/Hydroventure, and the retro-styled PSN platformer Explodemon!.

And once you're done with those? Fear not - Stealth Bastard includes a FULL in-game level editor - the same we used to create the bundled levels - and even allows you to share, play and rate the community's creations from across the world.

And if you thought that was cool, we've not even got to the best bit yet: Stealth Bastard is free. Not 'freemium'. Completely free.

Endless fun. Zero cost. What are you waiting for?

Source: The Game Website.

112587.name: Modern Cappadocians
112587.description:
User Summary:

A non-canon fan supplement for Vampire: The Masquerade that presents one of the extinct clans in an alternative way that makes them an allowable clan in the modern World of Darkness setting. A later alternative take on this supplement was created: A Modern Clan Cappadocian & Related Bloodlines Primer.


From the Preface;

This document contains information on the Cappadocian Clan for use in the Modern Nights. It is not designed to be compatible with the canon history of Vampire: the Masquerade or Dark Ages: Vampire. It is assumed that when the Giovanni attempted to destroy the Cappadocians, they failed. Cappadocius himself was diablerized because that was all part of his Master Plan, but his Clan fought back successfully and destroyed the Giovanni.

The Cappadocians become a Camarilla Clan who practice the art of Necromancy and spend their nights searching for scholarly insight. They're a Clan of academics, doctors, theologists and scientists always searching for answers to where they fit into the world and how the world fits together.

A large faction of the Clan, enraged at the folly of Cappadocius and full of rage, joined the Sabbat to become the Cappadocian Antitribu, the sorcerous shock troops of the Sabbat. These dark magicians raise zombie armies and rot their enemies alive. They enslave ghosts as spies and agents. The unholy magic of their bloodline is potent and they're all too happy to use it.

The largest Cappadocian bloodline, the Lamia, also survived the Giovanni's attempted coup and played a large part in destroying the upstart Venetians. These warrior-women joined with the Cappadocian Antitribu in the Sabbat, spreading plagues among the mortals and slaying whatever vampires they can lay their hands on for the greater glory of their Dark Mother.

112588.name: A Modern Clan Cappadocian & Related Bloodlines Primer
112588.description:
User Summary:

A non-canon fan supplement for Vampire: The Masquerade that presents one of the extinct clans in an alternative way that makes them an allowable clan in the modern World of Darkness setting. This is an alternative take on an earlier supplement: Modern Cappadocians.


From the Introduction:

The author would like to thank everyone who has been helpful in bringing this document to light, especially Telgar for sparking an idea I had been working on awhile now about how I could bring back the Clan of Death, and to Mr. Gone, for assisting me in the creation of these official-looking pdfs. Without his assistance, I would still be stuck doing everything in Microsoft Word.

Anyway, this document consists of clan spreads of Clan Cappadocian and a Sabbat-allied bloodline of male Lamia Antitribu, that I have dubbed Morbus, which is borrowed, and partially converted from a bloodline of the same name from Vampire the Requiem. As always, the documents within are entirely a work of fanfiction and are not intended to replace the clans and bloodlines published in 20th Anniversary Edition Vampire the Masquerade, Vampire the Dark Ages, Dark Ages Vampire, and Vampire the Requiem, published by White Wolf Publishing, a subsidiary of CCP.

112589.name: Warriors
112589.description:
user summary

A Comprehensive d20 sourcebook for fantasy role-playing games.

This book amazingly expands upon the description of the Warrior NPC class in the d20 System. It is an unvaluable resource for players that want to explore the humble military career instead of the fighter individualistic career. There is an ample historical part that can help players to emulate the real medieval class.

There are 16 new prestige classes, more than 30 warrior playable sub-types (archers, mariners, traders, pikema, shieldbearer and many more) and dozens of new skills (craft and profession specialities in particular).

Obviously there are new feats, new equipment, weapons and rules for aerial warfare.

New rules for chariots, large beasts in combat, new magic items.

More than 20 new NPCs ready-to-use.

112590.name: Rebellion Era Infinities Sourcebook
112590.description:
From the Authors' Notes:

Thor A. Thorson Jr.:

Because of the tremendous support and encouragement from all who contributed to the Rise of the Empire Infinities Sourcebook and those who have perused this volume, Matt and I are pleased to release the second of hopefully five sourcebooks starting with the events in the previously mentioned sourcebook and then continuing into the Rebellion Era. In addition, we are also happy to include Brian Powell to help with springing ideas off of each other, and we hope that this sourcebook measures up to the content and quality of the previous sourcebook.

Matthew Norton:

It is a dark time in the galaxy. The Empire has arisen, the Rebellion is growing, and all out civil war is blossoming. And this is only in the second book! The sequel to our Rise of the Empire Infinities Sourcebook, the Rebellion Era Infinities Sourcebook, has proven to be the most daring book attempted by Thor, Brian and I. Inside is a rich tapestry of galactic life in the galaxy, yet a dark tone hangs over it all. This could not have been accomplished without Brian's and Thor's help. On my Christmas vacation I worked for a week hashing out the timeline, and then we literally examined every line for the next entire month toget the best vision of this dark time to you. And I appreciated Brian's and Thor's help, even if they made me scream on the inside, for they acted as a badly needed counter balance to me. And even though I lost much, much sleep working on this book, I can not be happier with what has been made. You, the Holonet, have been great and I would like to thank all of for your support for our previous book and your support for our current creation. Brian, we butted heads a lot, but you had some of the best ideas in the book. And Thor, thank you again for giving me a place to put my creativity and love for Star Wars into something I am truly honored and humbled to be a part of.

Brian Powell:

In every story there is a start, a finish, and conflict in between. In the tale of putting this sourcebook together, Thor gave us a start, Matt lead us to an ending, and along the way I created plenty of conflict. My contributions to this sourcebook, came a few months after Thor and Matt begun the timeline, so I was poised to see the story from a position of a first time reader, and with my input, together the three of us made the story better. Many hours spent online in chat sessions we tempered the great work of Thor, and made it better, grittier, and larger in scope. To Thor, I wish to express my gratitude for including me in an expanded role in his grand works. To Matt, I wish to express thanks for truly being a great source of powerful ideas which gave me something to live up to during our creation phase. Also would like to thank the Holonet community for giving each of us a home on the web, where we have been honored to share ideas with and participate in numerous projects.

112591.name: Paperclip Railways: Freight Expansion
112591.description:
This mini-expansion was printed in VERY limited numbers as part of the preparations for Essen Spiel'11 and the launch of the Paperclip Railways Express Edition.

Five extra cards go into the station deck and trigger a Freight phase when drawn - this involves moving cubes around a bit.

The expansion is now available as a print'n play download from the Surprised Stare Games website.

Suprised Stare Games

112592.name: Riding Hero
videogameversion: North American Neo Geo CD edition
112592.description:
From the back of the box:

As a young street rider you will go for it all as you go head to head with these experienced proffesionals to win you Class "A" International License enabling you to compete in the famous 8 hour race. Role playing action brings you to the 8 hour race. Or challenge top riders in the Grand Prix Mode.

112593.name: Mortla: Claw of Wendigo
112593.description:
User Summary:

A non-canon fan supplement for Werewolf: The Apocalypse that presents a new form of Garou martial arts (comparable to the Stargazers' Kailindo) based on channelling Gnosis. Included are six combat manoeuvres, two Gifts, and details of the spirit called Windtooth.


From the Introduction:

Mortla is a series of techniques that employ a rapid succession of calculated strikes delivered to the opponent's body; resulting in various effects ranging from maiming to fatal. The art itself is based on the concept of using Gnosis to augment attacks, enhancing a Garou's natural weapons with the damaging effects of long-term exposure to cold weather.

With Gnosis behind each attack, natural weapons become capable of dealing damage that typically manifests as frostbite. After being hit it's possible for an enemy to experience extreme fatigue, degenerative muscle symptoms, tissue destruction, and a whole host of life threatening conditions. The use of Gnosis makes the cutting nature of each technique possible, making them seem more like something of a minor charm; this reflects the harsh and cold nature of Great Wendigo.

112594.name: Left Behind: Eternal Forces
112594.description:
Box Description:

THE ANTICHRIST IS COMING

Don't Be Left Behind.

-Invite up to 7 friends to play for FREE online.

-Witness spectacular visual effects as mysteries are unveiled

-Defend yourself from the forces of the Antichrist

-Defend against the spiritual influences and physical warfare of the antichrist's army through the power of prayer and worship.

-Control more than 30 unit types, each developed with unique attributes and special abilities... and witness Angelic appearances and Demonic battles as a direct result of your choices.

-Command your forces through the streets of New York in one of the most realistic recreations ever seen in a video game.

-No online subscription fees for online mulitplayer games. Choose to play as the Tribulations Force or as the forces of the Antichrist with up to 7 friends for FREE!

-Featuring original soundtrack by award-winning composer Chance Thomas (King Kong, X-Men, Lord Of The Rings)

112595.name: Arkham Horror: Dance of the Damned (Mythos)
112595.description: Want to raise the stakes? The novel, Dance of the Damned, introduces a mythos card of the same name that begins in play, presenting a persistent challenge for investigators. Like a ticking time bomb, the Dance of the Damned is ever increasing in power, growing stronger every time an investigator spends a Clue token or resolves a Headline mythos card. If the team can meet its lofty requirements in time, they can forever seal an inter-dimensional gate... but if they dawdle too long, a grim curse will fall upon them.

112596.name: Android: "A Golem, To Use the Vernacular"
112596.description: A single-card expansion that can be obtained by using the order form in the "Golem" book from Fantasy Flight Games. This is an event card entitled "A Golem, To Use the Vernacular" and allows you to use Haas' illicit talents.

boardgamehonor: 2013 Golden Geek Best Children's Board Game Nominee
112598.description:
In Monster Factory, the players take turns drawing and placing tiles, either adding to their own monsters or to those of their opponents. The goal is to make monsters that are big, but not so big that they go unfinished.

Nina Paley did the original art, with Marco Morte coloring it.
112598.name: Monster Factory

112599.name: The Lord Of The Rings: The Third Age (GBA)
videogameversion: North American Game Boy Advance edition
112599.description:
Box Description:

STRATEGY ROLE-PLAYING GAMES COME TO MIDDLE-EARTH

Re-create the battles from all three movies in this brand-new turn-based strategy game.

-Fight for good or evil in the war for Middle-earth.

-Unleash your best strategies with the new tactical combat system.

-Challenge a friend to multiplayer battles.

112600.name: Freedom Fighters
112600.description:
From RPG Description:

A highly detailed post-apocalyptic RPG from Fantasy Games Unlimited. The players portray freedom fighters who have taken up the fight against invading Soviet Forces, Martians, or aliens that can blend into human society - it is up to the GM to choose the invader to be faced by the Freedom Fighters!

112601.name: Arsenal 2060
112601.description:
From the back of the book:

Zeit für die schwere Artillerie!

Chummer, wenn dir in den Schatten das Blei um die Ohren fliegt, musst du aufrüsten - und ich kann dir geben, was du dann brauchst... Vielleicht eine tödliche Klinge? Ich kann dir ein scharfes Monoschwert verkaufen. Wie wäre es mit einer Knarre, damit es sich deine Gegner zweimal überlegen, dich anzugreifen? Eine brandneue Laserpistole vielleicht? Es könnte natürlich aus sein, dass du deinen Körper zu einer Waffe formen möchtest - ich kenne einen, der dir die Wildcat-Kampfkunst beibringen könnte. Aber denk immer daran: Die großen Kaliber kosten auch das große Geld!

Das Arsenal 2060 ist das komplette Nachschlagewerk für alle Waffen, die für Shadowrun 3.01D existieren. Alle Werte und Beschreibungen wurden überarbeitet und den aktuellen Regeln angepasst, so dass nun über 200 Waffen mit Werten, Beschreibungen und zu Teil auch Bildern vorliegen. Darüber hinaus finden Sie neues Waffenzubehör, Ausrüstung, Panzerung und Sprengstoffe. Zusätzlich zu den neuen Ausrüstungsgegenständen und Waffen enthält Arsenal 2060 neue Regeln für Kampfkünste, Feuerwaffendesign und -anpassung, SimSinn und Unterwasserkampf.


User Summary

Arsenal 2060 is the german version of Cannon Companion, but contains a lot of additional material. This additional material includes:

- 45 new pictures for firearms
- additional firearms and other equipment from various germany sourcebooks
- the weapons stats from the core rules
- shadowtalk for every firearm

112603.name: Nightmessenger (Vol 5 No 2 - Summer 2041)
112603.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Opening Fire, NOVA Works, The World "Out There," 10 O'clock News, Convention Calendar, Movie Releases, The Winning Formula: Part II, Duel Slang, Combat Rock, The Showroom: Odds and Oddballs, Gaming in Europe, Murphy's Corner, Local Hero, Return Fire, NOVA Projects, What's New?, & Closing Fire

112604.name: Dreamworks Madagascar: Operation Penguin
videogameversion: North American Game Boy Advance edition
112604.description:
Box Description:

Clever heist.

Crazy gadgets.

Crafty penguins.

-Team up with Madagascar friends and defeat pesky enemies.

-Use cool gadgets to make your daring escape

-Parachute, swim and karate chop through 18 missions.

112605.name: Lauf, Löwe, Lauf!
112605.description: This is a childrens variant of Pachisi. Each player has just three pawns (characters from the movie Lion King). The track fields have five different colours. So does the die. If you roll RED you can move to the next red field. If you roll the blank side you can choose a colour.

112606.name: Soccer Brawl
videogameversion: North American Neo Geo CD edition
112606.description:
From the back of the box:

The Cybernetic players use special kick shots and built-in arm phasers to destroy other players. Make sure your power meter is FULL when exercising these brutal tactics. Both stadiums, which are magnetically enclosed, enable you to kick or pass... off the wall! There are no fouls in this league, so watch your back or you'll get pulverized by the opposing team! You'll find here the most advanced sport in the world of soccer... SOCCER BRAWL!

112607.name: Wir machen mit     Spiel * Spannung * Umweltschutz
112607.description:
Objective: keep on moving - do not meet (feed) a devil (4 of
them)
find the correct answers for question cards
cooperative game
moving by turn - drawing cards
story:
Family Grünkern (= 'unripe spelt grains') moves all over the board. If you flip a card find the correct answer - otherwise you will feed the 'devil marker'
Questions like 'may you catch butterflies?' or
'may you drop a magazine onto a compost heap?'
content:
1 board
4 coloured meeples
2 dice
1 enviromental little devil
4 polluters
143 cards
1 schedule/scheme
1 rules

112608.name: Viewpoint
videogameversion: North American Neo Geo CD edition
112608.description:
From the back of the box:

Enter the world of Viewpoint, this stunning 3D diagonal-scrolling shooter, a visual masterpiece which allows you to play from a three-quarter perspective. Unimaginable enemies and inventive traps lurk around every corner and the intense action will rattle your senses! Enough gameplay to please even the most advanced gamer. Begin the fight with the rapid-fire gun and along the way collect the three shot device of destruction. Also, store energy to use The Wave in 4 levels of power. Or, choose from one of three different bombs to shoot your way through 6 stages of the most spectacular warzones of all time!

112609.name: Kinder Wereld Reis
112609.description:
With this game, children learn about geography, particularly topography. On the game board an illustrated map of the world is depicted. The continents are each in a different color, so they can be distinguished easily. The countries are easy to find by numbers and colors. At the edge of the board flags are shown.

The game contains 110 illustrated cards with questions (and answers) such as: Where do polar bears live? Where is the Eiffel Tower located? Background information, continents, countries and people pass by. Players have to respond the correct country, continent or ocean and have to designate them on the world map. By doing this correctly chips can be earned. The first player who has collected 8 chips wins the game.

The rules also describe a second way of playing. Here 24 random cards are put face up in the middle of the game board. The players take turns throwing a die and moving their pawn in accordance on the flags around the game board. They have to collect cards by selecting cards from the middle which are related to the country their pawn landed on. If no such a card is available, the player just has bad luck. Once a player reaches the last field, the player with the most cards wins.

112610.name: Weltraumfahrt
112610.description:
WELTRAUMFAHRT is a roll-and-move dice game which was published around 1960.
What makes it special is the highly attractive artwork and the beautiful playing pieces shaped as small astronauts, which glow in the dark...

112611.name: The Magic School Bus Explores Inside The Earth
videogamecompilation: The Magic School Bus Bonus Pack Volume 2
112611.description:
User Summary

Based upon an episode of the children's television program of the same name. The plot of the game is as follows: Arnold has lost all the rocks and minerals from his collection, so Ms. Frizzle decides to take the class on a field trip to locations around the Earth (and sometimes inside) to find them. After locating a rock/mineral, the player must find out what rock/mineral it is by performing numerous tests on it. There's also many fun mini-games.

112612.name: R.C. Grand Prix
videogameversion: North American Sega Master System edition
112612.description:
User Summary

In this game you will be racing with a RC car, against 3 other opponents in 10 different courses.
You compete for prize money, and will be able to purchase new suspensions, batteries, gears and a lot more to help you.
